content: Quiet people have the loudest minds.
author: Stephen Hawking

content: The quieter you become the more you can hear.
author: Ram Dass

content: Never love anybody who treats you like you're ordinary
author: Oscar Wilde

content: Pleasure in the job puts prefection in the work.
author: Aristotle

content: Hard work beats talent when talent doesn't work hard.
author: Tim Notke

content: Open your mind, before open your mounth...
Quiet the mind and the soul will speak.
author: Ma Jaya Sati Bhagavati

content: Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life.
author: Steve Jobs

content: Do it for peace of mind.
author: Leslie Norwalk

content: Peace begins with a smile
author: Mother Teresa

content: There is no path to peace. Peace is the path
author: Mahatma Ghandi

content: Only the dead have seen the end of war.
author: Plato

content: The two most powerful warriors are patience and time.
author: Leo Tolstoy

content: Knowledge is power.
author: Francis Bacon

content: Knowledge comes from learning. Wisdom comes from living.
author: Anthony Douglas Williams

content: Intelligence is the ability to adapt to change.
author: Stephen Hawking

content: As knowledge increases, wonder deepens.
author: Charles Morgan

content: Real knowledge is to know the extent of one's ignorance.
author: Confucius

content: Don't let your happines depend on something you may lose.
author: C.S. Lewis

content: You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough.
author: Mae West

content: If you can't be possitive then at least be quiet.
author: Joel Osteen

content: We cannot solve our problems with the same level of thinking that created them.
author: Albert Einstein

content: Even death is not to be feared by one who has lived wisely.
author: Buddha

content: Patience is the companion of wisdom.
author: Saint Augustine

content: Freedom is the oxygen of the soul.
author: Moshe Dayan

content: If my body is enslaved, still my mind is free
author: Sophocles

content: The computer was born to solve problems that did not exist before.
author: Bill Gates

content: Everyone should know how to program a computer, becouse it teaches you how to think!
author: Steve Jobs

content: Engineering is too important to wait for scince.
author: Benoit Mandelbrot

content: Time is relative; it's only worth depends upon what we do as it is passing
author: Albert Einstein

content: Friends buy you a lunch. Bestfriends eat your lunch.
Take time to be quiet.
author: Zig Ziglar

content: I keep quiet. I don't say much. I watch and learn.
I think a lot, but I don't say much.
author: Anne Frank

content: Water is the driving force of all nature.
author: Leonardo da Vinci

content: Education is not preparation for life; education is life itself.
author: John Dewey

content: Teachers who love teaching teach children to love learning.
Who dares to teach must never cease to learn.
author: John Cotton Dana

content: The roots of education are bitter, but the fruit is sweet.
author: Aristotle

content: Freedom can occur only through education.
author: Friedrich Schiller

content: Let us pick up our books and pencils. They are our most powerful weapon.
author: Malala Yousafzai

content: The whole purpose of education is to turn mirrors into windows.
author: Sydney J. Harris

content: By learning you will teach; by teaching you will learn.
Reading is to the mind what expercise is to body.
author: Sir Richard Steele

content: Tell me and I forget. Teach me and I remember. Involve me and I learn.
author: Benjamin Franklin

content: Good teacher know how to bring out the best is students.
author: Charles Kuralt
